episode_event_lusamine_family/4001_1001_:
Fwahahaha!
The victory is ours!

Did you see how in sync they were? How could
there be that much of a gap between us...

Going from three individuals battling to one
cohesive unit is proving rather difficult, isn’t it.

Lillie, dear, why don’t we try battling with just
the two of us first and see how it goes?
OK!
Good battle! Guess that’s another victory for us!
I’m sorry, Mother...

No need to apologize, dear. I know you did the
best you could.
Gladion, let’s try the same thing with you.
All right.
episode_event_lusamine_family/4001_1101_:
Lusamine and her family continued to fight hard,
battle after battle.

But it wasn’t enough to defeat the father-daughter
combo of Koga and Janine.
episode_event_lusamine_family/4001_1001_: Look at them go.

Norman! I thought you couldn’t make it today.
Did your plans change?

Brendan has some things he has to take care of
today, but I gave in to curiosity and decided to
come check things out on my own.

How’s it going? Has the training worked out well
for you?
I wish I could say it was going smoothly.

I assumed that our love for each other as a
family would make syncing up in battle a trifle.
It seems I was wrong.
Ah, don’t worry.

Brendan and I had a tough time finding our groove
together in the beginning, too.

We kept at it, though, and somewhere along the
way, it just started to click for us.
That’s family, though, eh?
Family...

Don’t trouble yourself over it too much, all right?
You’ll get there in time.

That may have been true for you and your son,
but we have very different families.

I have a feeling I know the reason mine hasn’t
been successful in this...
Lusamine...?
Yes! That was quite good!

[Name:PlayerNickname ], Gladion, Lillie,
you’re doing great! You’re really starting to
move with confidence!
episode_event_lusamine_family/4001_0402_: Yeah. I feel like my reaction time’s getting quicker.
episode_event_lusamine_family/4001_1001_:
At the rate you’re going, the two of you will
be able to sync up in battle without
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s help in no time.

I would expect no less from a pair of siblings
like yourselves.
Of course! We’re giving this our all!
Hmph. We’ve got this.
Come on, Lillie! Let’s finish ’em together!
episode_event_lusamine_family/4002_1001_:
Several days after the training session with
Koga and Janine...
the day of the family competition finally arrived.
Today’s the day.

We’ve got one match to prove ourselves.
I hope we do well.
episode_event_lusamine_family/4002_0401_: Oh, no, I am excited. It’s just...
episode_event_lusamine_family/4002_0402_: Y-you’re right. I know. It’s just...
episode_event_lusamine_family/4002_1001_:
I wish we’d had a little more time to prepare.
That’s all.

We did some more training after that first session
with Koga...

but the three of us are still struggling to get in
sync with each other as a team.

Well, moping around won’t fix anything, will it?
Come on, let’s try to cheer up!
I promise to fight with my full power!

You’re right. Our strategy should be more than
enough to defeat most of the teams here.
We’re gonna win this!
Hey, Gladion! Hey, Lillie!

Brendan? I didn’t know you were gonna be
competing today.
Yep! I’m here with my dad and Wally.
Have you gone over to check the matchups yet?
What? No, we haven’t had a chance yet.
Ha! I’ll save you the trip, then!
You’re looking at your opponents right here!
What?!
We’re matched up with you?!

Haha! Hope you’re prepared, ’cause we’re in it
to win it!
Brendan, Wally.
You should start getting ready for the match soon.
You got it, Dad.

I never would have guessed I’d be fighting
against you, Norman.
It came as a surprise to me as well.

Best of luck to both of us. Let’s give it our all
out there.
Hey... We need to change our strategy.
What?! What are you talking about, Gladion?

Did you see who we’re matched up against?
There’s no way we’re gonna win against a
powerhouse team from Hoenn like this.

If we wanna win, we’ve gotta give up trying to
get in sync with each other. It’s just not working.

Our only chance is to throw everything we’ve got
at them individually!

Gladion, we can’t just change our strategy like
that right before the match.

If we want our team to win, that’s just what
we’re gonna have to do.
But...

I...I think we should try our best to fight together
as a family, even if it means we don’t have a
chance to win!

Huh?! What’s the matter with you? There’s no
point in competing if you’re not trying to win!

All right, you two. Calm down. Talking things out
is good, but getting into an argument right before
a match isn’t going to help anyone.
I understand why you two are upset.
Mother...

We’re running out of time. Come on, we need to
start preparing.
That won’t be necessary.

There’s only one solution that can solve
our problem.
I’m removing myself from this team.
What...?
episode_event_lusamine_family/4003_1001_:
What do you mean you’re removing yourself from
the team?!
Where’s this coming from, Mother?

The two of you should understand how I came to
this conclusion. It’s simple.

There’s an obstacle preventing our team from
bonding together as a cohesive unit... Me.
That’s not true!

It’s all right, Lillie. I know this is my fault.
I have to face the consequences of the mistakes
I made in the past.

I opened up Ultra Wormholes across Alola,
subjected our beautiful islands to so much chaos...
And my selfish behavior tore our family apart.

It’s no wonder our efforts to unite as a team
have been a struggle.
I’m the one to blame.
Mother...

[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Please take my place in the competition and
fight with Lillie and Gladion.
With you by their side...

I’m sure this team will be able to fight as one
cohesive unit.

With me out of the picture, this team may even
stand a chance to win.
How can you be so selfish, Mother?!

The whole reason I entered us into this competition
was so that the three of us could fight together!
And at the first turn, you want to leave us?

Without you, there isn’t even a reason to take
part anymore!
Lillie...

Did you forget why we started practicing for
this in the first place?

This is a FAMILY competition.
We wanted to win it together as family!

If you won’t even be on the team, I’d rather
just withdraw altogether!
Gladion...

Lusamine, I don’t claim to be a perfect parent
either, but let me say this.

Just as parents love their children and want
what’s best for them...

children love their parents, too, and want what’s
best for us. It’s not a one-way street.
I really am a poor excuse for a mother, aren’t I.

Once again, I tried to force my decision on them
without stopping to consider how they might feel.
This time will be different.
Lillie, Gladion...

I was so focused on doing what I thought was
best for you, I never even stopped to ask if that
was what you wanted.

The two of you are already so strong. And not
only that, you’re also incredibly kind and caring.

As your mother, I could learn a thing or two from
you when it comes to that.

So come on! Let’s join together and show the
competition the full extent of our power!
We’re going to win this as a family!
We did it. We defeated Brendan’s team.
We did it, Mother!
Aw, man! I can’t believe we lost to them!
Congratulations, Lusamine. That was a good battle.

The evidence should be as clear as day after
a victory like that. The three of you make a
good team.
And you make a good family.
...Thank you, Norman.

When I heard our family would be fighting as a
team, I had no idea how things would turn out.
But I’m glad we did it.
Me too! It turned out to be so much fun!
Mother...
Gladion...
Promise we’ll do this together again sometime?
I promise.
Hmph.
(Honey...)

(I will continue to love our children and strengthen
the bond of our family.)

(I’ll protect these wonderful smiles of theirs in the
hope that one day, they’ll be as bright as yours.)
